絃字的基本解释

絃
xián
同“弦”①②⑥。

絃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xián］
［《廣韻》胡田切，平先，匣。］
同“弦1”。
(1)琴瑟类乐器上用以发音的生丝线。今亦用金属丝、尼龙丝等为之。
(2)指琴瑟之类的弦乐器。
(3)弹奏弦乐。
(4)指弦乐音。
(5)旧时以琴瑟喻夫妇，故谓妇死曰“斷絃”，续娶曰“續絃”。
(6)弓上的弦。
(7)以喻直。

絃字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　絃； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页921第11
【廣韻】【正韻】胡田切【集韻】【韻會】胡千切，?音賢。【五經文字】琴瑟弦。亦用弦字作絃者，非。○按經典弦通作絃。【禮·樂記】淸廟之瑟，朱絃而疏越。【論語】聞絃歌之聲。　又【廣韻】許縣切【集韻】翾縣切【正韻】翾眩切，?音絢。【博雅】繩素也。今人以爲呼煙切，失之矣。凡弓弩琴瑟弦，皆从弓。

Basic explanation of words
string
xián
Same as "string"①②⑥.
string
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xián］
["Guangyun" Hu Tianqie, Pingxian, Xie. ]
Same as "string 1".
(1) The raw silk thread used for pronunciation on Qinse instruments. Metal wire, nylon wire, etc. are also used today.
(2) Refers to stringed instruments such as Qinse.
(3) Playing string music.
(4) Refers to the string tone.
(5) In the old days, Qinse was used as a metaphor for couples. Therefore, it was said that the death of a woman was "broken string", and the renewed marriage was called "continued string".
(6) The string on the bow.
(7) To Yuzhi.
string

Those who also use string characters to make strings are not. ○ Make chords according to classic chords. 【Rite·Yue Ji】The Tse of Cheongmiao, Zhu Xian and sparse. [The Analects] Hear the sound of string songs.　[Guangyun] Xuxian cut [Jiyun] Yixian cut [Zhengyun] Yixian cut,? Yin Xian. [Bo Ya] Sheng Su also. Today, people think that the smoke is cut, and it is lost. The strings of all bows and crossbows are from the bow.
